loginDescription: Enter your credentials to access the panel.
registerDescription: Fill in the details to create your account.
platformGoalEN: A smart education platform for managing student grades, attendance, and communication with parents — making the teacher’s work easier and more effective.
platformGoalRW: Urubuga rw’ikoranabuhanga rufasha mu gucunga amanota y’abanyeshuri, imyitwarire, no gutumanaho n’ababyeyi — koroshya akazi k’umwarimu.
platformGoalFR: Une plateforme intelligente pour gérer les notes, la présence des élèves et communiquer avec les parents — facilitant le travail des enseignants.
featureGradeManagementDesc: Easily record and store student grades for various assessments.
featureReportCardsDesc: Automatically generate comprehensive student report cards.
featureSmsEmailDesc: Send grade summaries and updates to parents via SMS/Email (Future).
featureAttendanceBehaviorDesc: Track student attendance and behavior effectively.
featureTeacherStudentReportsDesc: Generate insightful reports for teachers and students.
featureAssignmentsDesc: Assign and track student assignments and projects (Future).
featurePhotosDocumentsDesc: Securely store student photos and relevant documents (Future).
featureCommunicationDesc: Facilitate communication between teachers and school leadership.
systemDefaultsDescription: Set system-wide default values and school information.
passMarkDescription: This value (50) is used system-wide for determining Pass/Fail status.
themeDescription: Dark mode can be toggled using the sun/moon icon in the application header.
notificationsDescription: Email notifications for system events are planned for a future version.
advancedFeaturesDescription: Advanced features like full PDF/Excel exports and SMS/email notifications are planned for future versions. Current CSV exports offer basic data extraction.
noPermissionSystemSettings: You do not have permission to change system settings.
